featured.text: Situated on both banks of the winding River Vltava, Prague is like one big open-air museum.

definition.zh_def: 伏尔塔瓦河，捷克共和国最长的河流，流经布拉格。
definition.en_def: The Vltava is the longest river in the Czech Republic, flowing through Prague.
definition.example: The Vltava River is famous for its beautiful scenery and historic bridges.
